website_summaries.verdict: The AAXA M4 Mobile LED Projector is similar to other models that combine a WXGA DLP chip and an LED light source, but adds a TV tuner and battery to its mix of features.
pros: Built-in TV tuner and coaxial connector
Reads files from microSD cards and USB memory keys
Can use AC power or rechargeable battery
cons: Image quality with a VGA connection is far less watchable than the same image with HDMI

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best portable projector made by AAXA. It's fairly strong and has a nice clear image.
customer_reviews.author: adam m p

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Great, small projector with BIG value. Used it for several presentations and it worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Woods

customer_reviews.title: AAXA M4
customer_reviews.text: awesome!! but I wish it had a better remote, for changing channels .but all in all it's a GREAT PROJECTOR !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I received my package with a missing back piece, no manual and no A/V cables as listed. It looks cheap, but works decently.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Ray Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector ..... it's wonderful and has a great powerful and clear picture. It really worked to the best of my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: Faulty power switch design
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this projector. When I received it, I loved the 90 minute battery and bright image. HOWEVER, the power switch (on/off rocker) seems to be faulty by design. The first time I turned it on, it didn't turn on. I had to wiggle the switch. Then, it turned off by itself. I had to wiggle the switch to get it back on. I can imagine that it could easily turn itself on in a carrying bag as well. BE WARNED: this doesn't seem like an issue with just my unit but an inherent design problem.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: the projector has been working fine for a few weeks i liked how it turns ...
customer_reviews.text: hello, the projector has been working fine for a few weeks i liked how it turns on instantly however, it is not yet a month old and the projector is showing a pink light instead of white seems like a bad bulb, but its less than a month old..
customer_reviews.author: mr

customer_reviews.title: Hi, when I received it I hear some noise inside project ,,, it seems broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, when I received it I hear some noise inside project ,,, it seems broken ...... .
customer_reviews.author: Hamizan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little projector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little projector. Very pleased with my purchase! Used it in an exhibition where it was running non-stop 6 hours a day, 5 days a week for a month. Definitely gets a bit heated though so be careful if using it in a very confined space.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress Galiano

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews, I was excited to get the new projector and start figuring it out but was disappointed that the product is missing the User Manual and A/V cable that are both listed in the Package Contents. I'm very worried the the product have have been produced with the same lack of quality control.
customer_reviews.author: EMorrell

customer_reviews.title: Very good propagand, very bad article
customer_reviews.text: I recived one as a gift. No start up. Only a blue light in the power source, and a red one in the projector side. But not usable. Very good propagand, very bad article.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Calderón

product_meta.title: AAXA M4 Mobile LED Projector with 90 Minute Battery Life, WXGA 1280x800 Resolution, 800 Lumens, DTV Onboard, 20,000 Hour LED
product_meta.description: Style:With BatteryThe AAXA M4 is the World's Brightest Battery Powered Projector. It revolutionizes mobile projection by mating a lithium ion battery with LED Projection technology. This union creates a no compromise portable projector that can deliver high quality images both plugged in or on battery power. With it's third generation optical system, the M4 features a brilliant 800 Lumen optical engine powered by 20,000 Hour Vibrant Color LEDs and a native HD resolution of 1280x800 (WXGA). This optical power house enables the M4 to deliver vivid 150" displays in dark areas and usable displays in brightly lit areas - a first for mobile projection. The AAXA M4 revolutionizes mobile projection with it's 28-watt lithium ion battery onboard that supports a 90 minute operating time (in eco brightness mode) and produces over 3 times the brightness of other battery powered projectors for anywhere-anytime projection. This onboard battery is known as a "premium grade" battery that is designed to retain 85% of it's charge over 1000 charge cycles. The AAXA M4 is the ultimate portable projector for business and professional users. It is an all-in-one projection solution that includes an onboard media player, digital picture playback, a digital TV tuner (North America ATSC only, antenna required), and an array of inputs including Composite, HDMI, and VGA. The powerful onboard media player decodes files directly off a USB stick or Micro SD Card and is capable of handling high resolution videos, movies, and high mega-pixel pictures. This feature allows users to leave the laptop and power cords at home by delivering presentations and videos directly from the projector while fully cordless. Finally, the array of inputs includes HDMI, VGA, and Composite video and enables users to connect an array of data sources including smart-phones directly to the projector. With the AAXA M4 professional users can deliver presentations, play videos, and watch digital TV all from a single self-powered device.
feature_bullets: Ultra-Bright 800 Lumen DLP Optical Engine with 20,000 Hour LED Light Source
Onboard Battery (90 Minute), Media Player, & Digital TV (requires antenna)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars28 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
